title: 求解！为什么我不是辅助？？
author: guanly
txt_content:
在游戏里没有什么权限
安装了GroupManager
Groups文件：
# Group inheritance
#
#
 Any inherited groups prefixed with a g:
 are global groups
#
 and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
#
 Groups without the g:
 prefix are groups local to this world
#
 and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
#
 Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'


groups:

  Default:

    default: true

    permissions:

    - -bukkit.command.kill

    inheritance:

    - g:groupmanager_default

    - g:bukkit_default

    - g:essentials_default

    - g:towny_default

    info:

      prefix: '&f'

build: false

      suffix: ''

  Builder:

    default: false

    permissions: []

    inheritance:

    - default

    - g:essentials_builder

    - g:towny_builder

    info:

      prefix: '&2'

      build: true

      suffix: ''

  Moderator:

    default: false

    permissions: []

    inheritance:

    - builder

    - g:groupmanager_moderator

    - g:bukkit_moderator

    - g:essentials_moderator

    - g:towny_moderator

    - g:vanish_moderator

    info:

      prefix: '&5'

      build: true

      suffix: ''

  Admin:

    default: false

    permissions: []

    inheritance:

    - moderator

    - g:groupmanager_admin

    - g:bukkit_admin

    - g:essentials_admin

    - g:towny_admin

    - g:vanish_admin

    info:

      prefix: '&e&l[总受]'

      build: true

      suffix: ''

  Owner:

    default: false

    permissions:

    - '*'

    - -vanish.*

    inheritance:

    - admin
    - g:groupmanager_admin

    - g:bukkit_admin

    - g:essentials_admin

    - g:towny_admin

    - g:vanish_admin

    info:

      prefix: '&e&l[总攻]'

      build: true

      suffix: '大人'

User文件：
users:

  cjj:

    group: Admin
    subgroups: []

    permissions:

    - groupmanager.noofflineperms
  yi_shenpan:

    group: Admin
    subgroups: []

    permissions:

    - groupmanager.noofflineperms

  MobingHJ:

    group: Owner

    subgroups: []

    permissions:
    - '*'

replies.author: officeyutong
replies.txt_content:
后台打op 你的名字
再打manuadd 你的名字 owner
再打manuaddv 你的名字 prefix &4[腐竹]

replies.author: 學委
replies.txt_content: 您好。，先服务端控制台输入/op ID .其次，还要输入manuadd 123 XXX 将玩家123添加到XXX用户组；服主的话就是owner组。望采纳{:10_512:}

replies.author: guanly
replies.txt_content:
學委 发表于 2015-4-4 14:08
您好。，先服务端控制台输入/op ID .其次，还要输入manuadd 123 XXX 将玩家123添加到XXX用户组；服主的话就 ...
不能用啊

replies.author: guanly
replies.txt_content:
學委 发表于 2015-4-4 14:08
您好。，先服务端控制台输入/op ID .其次，还要输入manuadd 123 XXX 将玩家123添加到XXX用户组；服主的话就 ...
求详细啊？

replies.author: 學委
replies.txt_content:
guanly 发表于 2015-4-4 14:39
求详细啊？
服务端设置op不用打斜杠。

replies.author: yjw2625590539
replies.txt_content: 去你的  后台  控制台  输入  OP 你的名字  就可以了

replies.author: guanly
replies.txt_content:
C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\新建文本文档.html
出来这些

replies.txt_content:
